Interface IPayrollService

PayrollService
public interface IPayrollService

  • Method Details

    • generatePayroll

      void generatePayroll(int employeeId, String startDate, String endDate, double basicSalary, double overTime, double otherPay, double deductions)
      Generates payroll for an employee based on the provided details.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom payroll is generated.
      startDate - The start date of the payroll period.
      endDate - The end date of the payroll period.
      basicSalary - The basic salary of the employee.
      overTime - The overtime pay for the employee.
      otherPay - Any other additional pay for the employee.
      deductions - Deductions from the employee's salary.

    • getPayrollById

      void getPayrollById(int payrollId) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves and displays the details of a payroll based on the provided payroll ID.
      Parameters:
      payrollId - The ID of the payroll to retrieve.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

    • getPayrollsForEmployee

      List<Payroll> getPayrollsForEmployee(int employeeId)
      Retrieves a list of payrolls associated with a specific employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom payrolls should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Payroll objects representing the employee's payrolls.

    • getPayrollsForPeriod

      List<Payroll> getPayrollsForPeriod(String startPeriod, String endPeriod)
      Retrieves a list of payrolls for a specific period.
      Parameters:
      startPeriod - The start date of the period for which payrolls should be retrieved.
      endPeriod - The end date of the period for which payrolls should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Payroll objects representing payrolls for the specified period.
